attributes.additional_details:
END BENEFIT SANCTIONS NOWS

We Undersigned Call For The Immediate And Unconditional Ending Of Benefit Sanctions .

The system  of Benefit Sanctions imposed by Job Centre Plus and the DWP is in breach of Natural Justice and International Human Rights Law and should be ended without delay.
(for an explanation see http://www.eventsandissuesinternational.bravesites.com/  )
